name: Fear OF Darkness
description:
GamePlay:

Fear of darkness is a free 2d top down game with a story that talks about a villain who destroyed the world . And by that he left a chaotic world full of monsters . Your mission in this game is to survive and fight these monsters along with 3 difficult bosses in order to reach the last villain who caused all of this and who is also your evil twin . During your adventure you will encounter 4 different power trees . Each tree gives you a specific unique power ( speed , magic , weapons , health ... ).

Controls :

 MOVEMENT  W , S , A ,D  PAUSE 
ESCAPE
SHOOT 
MOUSE LEFT CLICK

Features :

- 10 different levels with different places.

- Great graphics with Post-Processing effects.

- Challenge yourself by surviving and defeating monsters.

- A very simple and enjoyable gameplay.

- Different armors , Different weapons , Different power trees.

System Requirements :

Recommended  Minimum  CPU :   2.8Ghz // Intel i5  GPU :  4 GB VRAM  RAM :  8 GB CPU :   2.3Ghz // Intel i3 GPU :  1 GB VRAM  RAM :  4 GB
